outline:
1. to go around, go about, travel about in, go about in trade
    1. (Qal)
      1. to go about to and fro (in business)
      2. trader, trafficker (participle)
    2. (Pilpel) to palpitate
kjv_def: go about, merchant(-man), occupy with, pant, trade, traffick.
strongs_def: to travel round (specifically as a pedlar); intensively, to palpitate
